column1: Kirinki was one of the many species of birds found in Númenor
column3: that were not known in Middle-earth. The kirinki were said to be smaller than wrens
column5: and voices so high that they could hardly be heard by Men.

column1: The meaning of kirinki is unknown. Perhaps it is a Quenya word
column2: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/elfling/message/16420 Kirinki (July 25, 2002) (and related messages) at the Elfling (accessed 13 March 2011) seemingly incorporating the diminutive ending -incë.Helge Fauskanger
